title: Penny Mordaunt – 2017 Speech on Disability Inclusion
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Penny Mordaunt, the Secretary of State for International Development, in the House of Commons on 30 November 2017.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/pennymordaunt.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/pennymordaunt.jpg)
